verbose_text: In order to confirm the effects of miR-125a on Ara-C-induced differentiation in K562 cells, we also analyzed the expression of the common erythroid markers glycophorin A (GYPA), erythropoietin receptor (EPO-R), and CD71 / TFRC.
evidence: expression of the common erythroid markers glycophorin A (GYPA), erythropoietin receptor (EPO-R), and CD71
